name: Silent Movement Training
description: Techniques to minimize noise and remain undetected during movement.

cards.title: Soft Footfall Technique
cards.description: Methods for reducing footstep noise across different surfaces.
cards.bulletpoints: Heel-to-toe rolling, crouched movement, surface adaptation

cards.title: Breath Control for Stealth
cards.description: Using controlled breathing to maintain calmness and reduce sound production.
cards.bulletpoints: Slow diaphragmatic breathing, controlled exhalation, masking breath with environmental noise
